i love to put a smile on peoples faces.

my eyes are brown.

participant_2.background:
I have a hard time opening up to my family, but my friends are my best support.
i got hired last week at mcdonald s.
i am a genius.
I used to be a farmer, but I had to give up the farm to pursue my passion for teaching.
I'm always up for going to a movie with my new love.

content.text: It's going good, I just got hired last week at McDonald's and I'm really excited about it!
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that. I used to be a farmer, but I had to give up the farm to pursue my passion for teaching.
Oh wow, that's really cool! I'm not sure what I want to do with my life yet, but I'm open to anything.
Well, whatever you decide to do, I'm sure you'll be great at it! You seem like a really smart and capable person.
Thanks! That means a lot. I'm trying to be positive and optimistic about the future.
That's the best attitude to have! I'm sure you'll achieve great things in life.
Thanks! I hope so! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play the guitar and I love to eat pizza. I also enjoy spending time with my friends and family.
That's awesome! I love pizza too! I don't know how to play any instruments, but I love to sing.
Singing is awesome! I wish I could sing.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will! I'm always up for trying new things.
That's the spirit! I'm always up for trying new things too.
